mutants.mutated_line: consonants_in_first = set((c for c in first_sentence if c in consonants))

mutants.original_line: consonants_in_first = set(c for c in first_sentence if c in consonants)
mutants.mutated_line: consonants_in_second = set((c for c in second_sentence if c in consonants))

mutants.original_line: consonants_in_second = set(c for c in second_sentence if c in consonants)
mutants.mutated_line: consonants_in_second = set((c for c in second_sentence if c not in consonants))
